lines.text: What do you think of women, kiddie?
Oh, there's room in the world for 'em.
[Wanting Charlie to woo Dixie, who's talking too much about Charlie's dangerous 'secret']
All right. Anything for my art.

[to Castle, after being slapped]
I'll - break - you!
Why don't you say it, darling?
Am I the worst oaf in the world?
The world's a big place. You're the worst one in my life.
I don't care if I do see a snake. I'm sure I'd much rather see a snake than a Hollywood producer.

[to Marion]
"You swat the fly from my face with a hammer"
